0.title: Business event ingestion over time
0.query:
fetch logs, scanLimitGBytes:-1
| filter event.type == "Data Source"
| fields timestamp, status, event.type, account_number, alias:finance_service_type, amount, event.id, event.kind, event.provider, payment_id, transaction_end_time, transaction_start_time, transaction_status, transaction_type
| sort timestamp, direction:"descending"
| limit 10000

1.title: Top 4 transactions
1.query:
fetch logs, from:now()-21d, scanLimitGBytes:-1
| filter contains(account_number, "ATM Networks") or contains(account_number,"Third-party API") or contains(account_number,"Cash services") or contains(account_number,"Mobile banking apps")
| fields timestamp, content, amount, account_number, transaction_type
| fields amount , account_number, transaction_type
| summarize TotalTranscation=count(), by:{account_number, transaction_type}
| fields account_number, alias:`Finance Service Type`, transaction_type, alias:`Transaction Type`, TotalTranscation
